snippet: The defect under study is the buckle of the Graco children’s car seats, which were recalled this year.
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration begins probe into whether Graco Children's Products delayed reporting safety defect that led to recall of 6.1 million children's car seats.
lead_paragraph: The defect under study is the buckle of the Graco children’s car seats, which were recalled this year.

headline.main: Car Seat Maker Graco Under Investigation for Delayed Reporting of Defect
headline.print_headline: Car Seat Maker Under Investigation for Delayed Reporting of Defect
